thread.title: Squirrels have stolen over 40 candy bars from Toronto store
thread.title_full: Squirrels have stolen over 40 candy bars from Toronto store

title: Squirrels have stolen over 40 candy bars from Toronto store
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Squirrels have stolen over 40 candy bars from Toronto store 9 January 2017 Last updated at 15:31 GMT 
The owners of a convenience store in the Canadian city of Toronto have taken to social media for help after squirrels began stealing their merchandise. 
The store has lost more than 40 chocolate bars. 
Video by Dan Lytwyn, footage courtesy Luke's Grocery Related Topics
